import-definition.name: CT DOE SASID Import
import-definition.comment:
Look up District Student ID from text file comparing to STD_ID_LOCAL and if match, then update STD_ID_STATE with corresponding value from corresponding values in SASID column of csv file
District Student ID and SASID are required in a csv format. save as csv
